Here's my attempt at a Blackguard Sorcerer Spellsword

Used the rogue class to access UMD, Tumble, Evasion (combined with good saves) and Uncanny Dodge

HP was the biggest issue here with the build, skill points as well

AB was also challenging. At present its Base 38 which is ok for a spellsword but more would have been nice. Has 4 attacks per round hooray

Maybe I should have gone dex focused, which combined with 6d6 sneak attack and divine might/sorcerer goodness it might have been cool

posts.author: conlaoch
posts.content:
Looks nice!!    only thing she lacks is still spell to be able to cast without having to strip her armor off.  Now if you were to use this chick on WoG, there is armor that has no spell failure, though it would be awhile before she could obtain that on her own.  Or use the gems to craft an item to reduce arcane failure.

As much as I love having plenty of hitpoints, i'd almost be willing to sacrifice toughness for still spell just to be able to recast as needed.

Either way.. nice spells word...    them's one of my favorite kinda toons...

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
This is my second draft for this Blackguard Sorceress Spellsword.

This time I have swapped Rogue for Red Dragon Disciple, which as nice synergies with +8 Str (for extra AB), +cons +int +cha to help with HP / skill points and charisma

Thanks Conlaoch for your comment on Still spell, I was about to post this draft when I read it and made some modifications to swap it for Toughness before I posted it

Toughness would have got the build's HP up to 400 though :)

Resulting base AB is 42 now which is above the target for a spellsword (40) but attacks per round reduced to 3 / round. Gone with Warhammer and Tower Shield to give them the smackdown 

Now I look at my build again I could drop blackguard to 4 and put sorcerer to 26 to get a bonus epic feat at the cost of 1 AB which doesn't sound too bad to me... like armor skin... or something else?
